item.title: As more Catholic churches close, Philadelphia is trying something new
item.description: The Catholic Church is facing aging congregations, fewer priests and financial strain. In many places, this has meant closing parishes. But in Philadelphia, they're trying something different.
item.content:encoded: The Catholic Church is facing aging congregations, fewer priests and financial strain. In many places, this has meant closing parishes. But in Philadelphia, they're trying something different.

item.title: Pope Leo returns 62 artifacts to Indigenous peoples from Canada
item.description: The Vatican returned 62 artifacts to Indigenous peoples from Canada, a historic restitution that is part of the Catholic Church's reckoning with its role in helping suppress Indigenous culture.

item.title: Catholic bishops talked about immigration and transgender care at U.S. gathering
item.description: U.S. Catholic bishops gathered in Baltimore, where they elected new leaders, responded to Pope Leo's call to speak on immigration and issued new directives on transgender care for Catholic hospitals.

item.title: U.S. bishops officially ban gender-affirming care at Catholic hospitals
item.description: The bishops' decision formalizes a yearslong process for the U.S. church to address transgender health care. They also approved a special message on immigration, expressing concern over enforcement and conditions in detention centers.
